name: Villa d'Este

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My wife and I stayed here for 3 days last July while attending a wedding on Lake Como. I rarely go to a place for the hotel however even if there was nothing interesting to see or do around Lake Como ,this would be a hotel that one should try to stay in at one point in ones life. Everything about this hotel has a sense of timeless perfection that is impossible to achieve in a new "6 star" type of place. From the fantastic smelling toiletries to the luxurious bedsheets, the stunning gardens, and the perfect, unobtrusive service everything has been honed to perfection over the decades. I will leave you with an attached photo of our breakfast table: a perfect table setting, right beside one of the most stunning lakes in the world, some delicous orange juice, a perfect coffee, the scent of jasmine and cypress in the air...it really cant get any better than that...you owe it to youself to spend at least 1 day here.
reviews.title: This should be on your bucket list

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The Villa d'Este is one of my favorite destination for short stay. For the luxury of the hotel, the fine dinning, and the setting on the lake.
reviews.title: The Italian Luxury Palace

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The setting on the Como lake is magical.The view is very special : dark blue water of the lake surrounded by mountains. In the summer you can enjoy the amazing swimming pool they place on the lake... it is quiet special. There is also a nice spa with an indoor swimming pool.
reviews.title: "Exquisite distinction"

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The restaurant is excellent and very chic, make sure dress up (no training shoes) men have to wear jacket and tie
reviews.title: If you have to ask, the answer is YES

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I am usually not a big fan of buffet breakfast but this one is very very nice.
reviews.title: Did I say "luxurious"
Magical Enchanting Luxury at its Best
reviews.text: I think this is just the best luxury historic hotel I have ever stayed in. The setting on Lake Como is magical and the grounds enchanting with new garden and lake discoveries around every corner. The hotel furnishings and flowers are exquisite. The formal dining room setting is picture perfect. Service is personalized, attentlve and first rate. The more casual dining room is also excellent and perfect in a luxuriously casual manner. Spa facilities also superb. Upon entering and staying at Villa D'Este, we felt like we were in our own world of classic elegance and majestic scenery.

reviews.title: The Best Dining Experience of my Life
reviews.text: My spur of the moment decision to visit Italy was made on Wednesday and I arrived in Milan the following Sunday. With no reservations other than a rental car and a hotel room near Como, I felt as free as a medieval minstrel to explore northern Italy for the next two weeks. So now, what to do?

reviews.title: Simply the D'est
reviews.text: My beautiful and well traveled friend, Clare Glace, had always dreamed of visiting Villa d'Este in Cernobbio, so I booked passage on one of Como's lake boats that would take me over to Cernobbio to view the hotel from off-shore. The town and the hotel are visible from the Como's harbor, and both are elegantly beautiful when approached in this way. Then and there I decided to have dinner in one of the finest restaurants in Europe and a few hours later, I called the hotel to reserve a table.

reviews.title: Recent upgrade puts VdE back on top European Hotel list
reviews.text: I explained that I would be dining alone and requested a good table outside near the lake. I was told, "Sir, I will gladly reserve a table for you, but please realize that our hotel guests are our first priority." I replied, "That is completely understandable, sir, but may I request the best table of those you have available?" "I will do my best, sir." was his reply.

reviews.title: The ultimate destination hotel.
reviews.text: I arrived at 7:30 and was greeted by name in the lobby by hotel staff. "Mr. Hutzler, welcome to Villa d'Este. We have your table prepared. Please come this way!" With that, I was led to a perfect table located within a foot or two of the railing at lake's edge. I was seated and for the next two hours, I was treated as if I was a visiting dignitary. The meal and the wine was spectacular, and the service was impeccable! I was even treated to a full moon rising over the lake near the end of the evening! It was the best dining experience of my life!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I knew quite a bit about Villa d'Este before visiting and had very high expectations. I was a bit worried that no place could live up to how much I had built up this place in my mind. I'm so pleased to say not only was I not disappointed, but Villa d'Este exceeded my expectations.
reviews.title: Villa d'Este - Better than even imagined

reviews.text: We arrived on our wedding anniversary, and the hotel included a very nice bottle of champagne, fruit, and note congratulating us when we arrived. The rooms are just beautiful. We had a top junior suite with balcony and full lake view - spectacular. We were in the Queens Pavilion, which I think in hindsight I preferred to the main building as it was a bit more secluded, quiet, and the views were stunning.
reviews.title: Relatives Wedding

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Breakfasts were a real treat with mimosas and cooked to order eggs, in a beautiful setting. We took a private boat ride around the lake with stops in Bellagio and lunch on a little island - this was one of the highlights of our entire trip to Italy. Do be sure to arrange prior to arriving at the hotel.
reviews.title: One of the classic hotels of the world...

reviews.text: This is one of the best hotels in the world - if you can go, don't hesitate.
reviews.title: Grazie mille!!

reviews.text: Words really can't describe this experience, this really is a truly magical hotel hence why it was voted the readers best hotel worldwide by the Telegraph. My visit was for a relatives wedding otherwise this experience would have been totally un-obtainable!
reviews.title: One of our best meals in Italy

reviews.text: I went to pay a visit to see this jewel on the lake. This classic hotel feels like you are at an old world resort, you don't want to leave the premises. If you want the best room get the Cardinal suite with it's huge balcony, of course overlooking the lake. La dolce vita!
reviews.title: Luxury on the lake
Beautiful Hotel!
reviews.text: I loved this hotel. We had a spectacular view from our room, the gardens are gorgeous and the location is the best in Como. It only gets 4 stars because the rooms are a little tired. For what you pay here, they should at least change out the carpet every 20 years and get new curtains. I felt like I was staying at Grandmas house....

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This made the second part of our honeymoon and words fail me. Sheer opulence you are treated just like royalty, we arrived to find champagne and strawberries in our suite and a card from the manager. I really can't say anything negative about this wonderful place.
reviews.title: You only live once

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Beautiful Italian old fashion classic Palace set on the Como lake. You feel out in time.
reviews.title: Dolce Vita

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: A very romantic place to stay. Very relaxing.
reviews.title: Excellent by all standards!

description: Experience the splendor, the grandeur, the intrigue and the magic of Villa d'Este- an opulent hotel overlooking glorious Lake Como. Hailed as one of the best hotels in the world by Travel & Leisure, Condé Nast Traveler and Forbes Traveler, this famous resort destination has been widely praised for its beautiful gardens, exquisite cuisine, gala celebrations, impeccable décor and extraordinary hospitality.
